personas.name: Alice Johnson
personas.short_scenario: Alice uses the manual to set up and optimize her new smart home device for daily convenience.

questions.question: How do I set up the device?
questions.answer_found: Follow the clear step-by-step instructions on page 2.
questions.comment: Setup instructions are clear and concise.
improvement_suggestions: Include a troubleshooting section for setup issues.

questions.question: How do I connect to Bluetooth?
questions.comment: The manual lacks sufficient detail on Bluetooth connectivity.
improvement_suggestions: Provide a dedicated Bluetooth connection section.
Include images of the Bluetooth button.

questions.question: How do I charge the device?
questions.answer_found: Connect the charger to the DC-IN port as shown on page 3.
questions.comment: Charging instructions are straightforward and easy to follow.
improvement_suggestions: Add a visual diagram for connector placement.
